TopicTitle: [1.2.x] [1.4 in Development] Real KSC in KSP Dev Continued

Articles.Content: I think there's a tutorial for helping you with the launchpad in the KK thread, other than that it looks great!
So, how are you guys doing? Getting close to a first release? (note: I am NOT asking for a release, just making a progress check)
IDK yet, although I'm still stuck on the gantry tower.

> 
> So, how are you guys doing? Getting close to a first release? (note: I am NOT asking for a release, just making a progress check)

We are improving. Getting closer everyday
Great to hear! After seeing Felbourn's new Alexandria episode today, can't wait to see this completed!

> 
> Great to hear! After seeing Felbourn's new Alexandria episode today, can't wait to see this completed!

Yea that episode was great. Had to explain to some people in the comments the answer to "hey we're did you get those launch pads"

> 
> Yea that episode was great. Had to explain to some people in the comments the answer to "hey we're did you get those launch pads"

Yeah, had to expect that! Was a little dissapointed that he did not mention the name of the mod (he probably forgot to)

> 
> Yeah, had to expect that! Was a little dissapointed that he did not mention the name of the mod (he probably forgot to)

No he did mention it
Oh! lol, guess I failed to hear it!
He said "which you can download at the KSP forums" or something like that near the beginning.

> 
> He said "which you can download at the KSP forums" or something like that near the beginning.

during the second launch he says he made the cape with Kerbal constructs and models from the real KSC mod
What is the anticipated release date?

It will be on --/--/----. 

We have no idea
Lol, hopefully i can finish learning blender in time to help you guys out!
Just like KSP it will be out when we feel its ready ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Just like KSP it will be out when we feel its ready ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That has been my motto for 25 years. It's done with it's done. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) It has worked out pretty well for me. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I've been following this mod for a while now and am confused how to install it. I have Kerbal Konstructs but I have no idea where I can download these launch pads. I would like to use them in my RO install.

> 
> I've been following this mod for a while now and am confused how to install it. I have Kerbal Konstructs but I have no idea where I can download these launch pads. I would like to use them in my RO install.

Presently, they are not fully ready to release them, but, from what I have gotten from both Triston and liquid, they will be released soon. Felbourn and I were able to get early release of them due to connections on the inside. But, they will be released soon.
SoÃ¯Â¼Å’if this require KK then how we gonna use it in RSS?

> 
> SoÃ¯Â¼Å’if this require KK then how we gonna use it in RSS?

KK is useable in anything, whether it be other planets, or RSS. It just isn't officially supported, due to the work it requires.

> 
> SoÃ¯Â¼Å’if this require KK then how we gonna use it in RSS?
